title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews guest hosts. The great EIB guest host and economic thinker Dr. Walter E. Williams passes away. We must be informed. Bill Barr spanking. Facebook bans Ken for questioning the COVID death count. Voter fraud updates you're not getting from the MSM. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Ken Matthews guest hosts. There are so many fraud investigations into the election, and yet it's not news? Paul Krugman at the NY Times: Biden will be the only president to govern against a chunk of Americans who refuse to accept his legitimacy -- what? We must take a stand against stealing elections. Imagine if the bank told you they had the right to decide how many dollars were in your account the way judges are doing with legal votes. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Ken Matthews guest hosts. Americans vs. sellout politicians. Vet your sources and be informed. Detroit is a hotbed of voting irregularity. Definitely check out the Sidney Powell "stolen election presser." The title "honorable" doesn't go for a lot of judges and representatives in government.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
